reviews.review: Играбельно, а так после того когда игра стала бесплатной читеров стала еще больше
Игра затягивает, но VALVE не могут сделать нормальный атичит, который будет банить только читеров, а не обычных игроков
Best game you'll ever play hands down.

I do the very like this game, i do like this game i recommend this.  I would want this game to win because its a remake of an old really good game and its creativity in the making, the game gave me goosebumps first trying it.  PLEASE TRY IT

madafakas we go hard or we go home

The core concept of the game is so good. The game brings you endless different types to play it from community bhop servers to ranked matchmaking. Even a potato could runt this game, so hardware is no problem. The esports scene is great and the game itself isn't broken. The only bad part of the game is the toxic community and cheaters, but I would still recommend this game.

Oyun Icerik bakimindan harik sadece hilelere biraz daha onem getirilse cok iyi olur ayrica biz para vererek alıyoruz cogu kisi suanda level kasarak alıyor bu cok yanlış bi davranis olmus cs go için para verenler le vermeyenler arasinda tabikide fark olmali bizler 87 tl odeyerek aldik bu hesaplari
Çok güzel ve adil bir oyun ama çok sık hile geliyor onun dışında güzel

Um jogo cheio de cheater e criança, não evoluiu nada desde 2015, só adicionou novas formas dos players gastarem dinheiro
É impossível jogar ranqueada, o jogo é infestado de wallhack e aimbot, principalmente nos ranques mais baixos.
Gastar dinheiro nesse jogo é o mesmo que o queimar.
Хорошая игра, но многовато читеров которые мешают играть, ну за последнее время их стало намного меньше)
